BAD.TITLE: Oops, something is wrong
BAD.BODY: We already know about the problem and have thrown all our efforts to eliminate it.

QUEUE_IS_FULL.TITLE: Too many hits
QUEUE_IS_FULL.BODY:
Our server can't handle it and we won't be able to process your file.
Please try again in 10-15 minutes.

SEED_IS_FULL.TITLE: Too many hits
SEED_IS_FULL.BODY:
Our server can't handle it and we won't be able to process your file.
Please try again in 10-15 minutes.

ERRORS.queue_is_full: We can not take the file to work
ERRORS.seed_is_full: We can not take the file to work
ERRORS.unknown_format_file: We don't support this format of archive
